pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarissā visikhāya piṇḍāya caramānā yena aññataraṁ kulaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.3_0: Atha kho te manussā taṁ bhikkhuniṁ bhojetvā etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.6_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo nāgaccheyyun”ti, bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.7_0: “amukasmiṁ, ayye, okāse vāḷā sunakhā caṇḍo balibaddo cikkhallo okāso.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.9_0: Aññatarāpi bhikkhunī tassā visikhāya piṇḍāya caramānā yena taṁ kulaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.10_0: Atha kho te manussā taṁ bhikkhuniṁ bhojetvā etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.12_0: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī tesaṁ manussānaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.18_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī kulaṁ maccharāyissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.20_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.6_0: cattāri kulāni— khattiyakulaṁ, brāhmaṇakulaṁ, vessakulaṁ, suddakulaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.8_0: “kathaṁ bhikkhuniyo nāgaccheyyun”ti bhikkhunīnaṁ santike kulassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.9_0: Kulassa vā santike bhikkhunīnaṁ avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.2.2_0: kulaṁ na maccharāyantī santaṁyeva ādīnavaṁ ācikkhati,
